metadata.title: Wings of Fire 2
metadata.description: A Jeopardy game based on the Wings of Fire series.
metadata.author: ChatGPT

200.answer: This RainWing becomes queen after the events of 'The Hidden Kingdom'.
200.question: Who is Glory?

400.answer: This MudWing is known for his exceptional strength and loyalty to Clay.
400.question: Who is Tsunami?

600.answer: This IceWing prince helps the Dragonets of Destiny.
600.question: Who is Winter?

800.answer: This SandWing is known for her healing abilities and is a close friend of Sunny.
800.question: Who is Thorn?

1000.answer: This NightWing betrays his tribe to help the Dragonets of Destiny.
1000.question: Who is Starflight?

200.answer: This is the name of the prophecy that predicts the coming of the Dragonets of Destiny.
200.question: What is The Dragonet Prophecy?

400.answer: This dragon tribe is known for their ability to see the future.
400.question: Who are the NightWings?

600.answer: This ancient NightWing wrote many of the prophecies.
600.question: Who is Darkstalker?

800.answer: This prophecy foretells the end of the war between the dragon tribes.
800.question: What is The Jade Mountain Prophecy?

1000.answer: This is the name of the myth about the dragon who can control all other dragons.
1000.question: What is The Dragonet of Destiny?

400.answer: This dragon is Starflight's best friend.
400.question: Who is Sunny?

600.answer: This dragon is Glory's love interest.
600.question: Who is Deathbringer?

200.answer: This dragon is the current queen of the SeaWings.
200.question: Who is Queen Coral?

400.answer: This dragon becomes the queen of the RainWings after the events of 'The Hidden Kingdom'.
400.question: Who is Glory?

600.answer: This dragon is the leader of the NightWings during the events of 'The Dark Secret'.
600.question: Who is Queen Battlewinner?

800.answer: This dragon is the queen of the SandWings at the beginning of the series.
800.question: Who is Queen Oasis?

1000.answer: This dragon is the queen of the IceWings during the events of 'The Dangerous Gift'.
1000.question: Who is Queen Snowfall?

200.answer: This tribe has the ability to breathe fire and blend into their surroundings.
200.question: Who are the RainWings?

400.answer: This tribe can breathe underwater and has bioluminescent scales.
400.question: Who are the SeaWings?

600.answer: This tribe has the ability to withstand extreme cold and breathe frostbreath.
600.question: Who are the IceWings?

800.answer: This tribe has the ability to see the future and read minds.
800.question: Who are the NightWings?

1000.answer: This tribe has the ability to produce venom from their tails.
1000.question: Who are the SandWings?

200.answer: This event led to the war between the dragon tribes.
200.question: What is the death of Queen Oasis?

400.answer: This battle marked the end of the war between the dragon tribes.
400.question: What is The Battle of Jade Mountain?

600.answer: This is the name of the event where the Dragonets of Destiny were revealed to the world.
600.question: What is The Great Hatching?

800.answer: This event led to the formation of the Jade Mountain Academy.
800.question: What is the end of the war?

1000.answer: This is the name of the event where Darkstalker was defeated.

category.title: Ancient Dragons
category.answer: This ancient NightWing dragon is known for his immense power and tragic downfall.
category.question: Who is Darkstalker?
